#summary Flaptor's idea page for GSOC 2008

Here is a summary of our open source projects and some ideas. We are also open to suggestions for new features that the student might be interested in implementing.

== [http://code.google.com/p/hounder Hounder] ==
A complete search engine solution that allows you to crawl the web, index documents and search them.
ideas:
  * improve management user interface
  * improve monitoring methods
  * installation wizard
  * [http://code.google.com/p/hounder/wiki/nextVersionIdeas other ideas]
  * we are also interested in performance improvements of any kind

== [http://code.google.com/p/clusterfest Clusterfest] ==
Clusterfest is an extensible opensource framework built in java for managing the complexity of a multi machine software system.
ideas:
  * new modules:
     * send commands
     * remote setting of properties
     * manage deploying of new versions
     * inter-node communications
  * enhance "plug n playability"
  * security - authentication
